prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (elegant ethereal man:1.2), (pale light-blue alien skin:1.2), short silver hair, serene intelligent expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed alien skin pores, (subtle bioluminescence:1.1), individual silver hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching futuristic patrol armor texture:1.2), sharp focus, soft studio lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human skin tone, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, (helmet hair:1.2)
